nodes.name: Daily 9 AM CST Trigger
nodes.notes: Runs every day at 9:00 AM. Set your N8N instance timezone to America/Chicago (CST)

parameters.query:
SELECT 
  id,
  owner_name,
  property_address,
  city,
  state,
  zip_code,
  excess_funds_amount,
  eleanor_score,
  eleanor_reasoning,
  phone,
  phone_1,
  phone_2,
  email,
  status,
  case_number,
  source_county,
  sale_date,
  expiry_date,
  is_super_golden,
  golden_match_source,
  distressed_property_url,
  distressed_listing_price,
  combined_opportunity_value
FROM maxsam_leads
WHERE 
  eleanor_score >= 85
  AND (phone IS NOT NULL OR phone_1 IS NOT NULL OR phone_2 IS NOT NULL)
  AND status IN ('new', 'ready_for_outreach')
  AND (
    last_contacted_at IS NULL 
    OR last_contacted_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
  )
  AND id NOT IN (
    SELECT lead_id FROM opt_outs WHERE is_active = true
  )
ORDER BY is_super_golden DESC NULLS LAST, eleanor_score DESC
LIMIT 50;

nodes.name: Query Hot Leads from Supabase
nodes.notes: Gets leads with score >= 85, valid phone, not contacted in 7 days, not opted out

nodes.name: Prepare SMS Message
nodes.notes: ULTIMATE 3-TEMPLATE SYSTEM: SUPER_GOLDEN (dual opportunity), GOLDEN_EXCESS (money owed), GOLDEN_HIGH_SCORE (potential). Uses exact amounts, case numbers, expiry dates for maximum trust and urgency.

parameters.query:
UPDATE maxsam_leads 
SET 
  status = 'contacted',
  last_contacted_at = NOW(),
  contact_attempts = COALESCE(contact_attempts, 0) + 1,
  updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = '{{ $json.id }}'::uuid
RETURNING id, status, last_contacted_at;

nodes.name: Update Lead Status
nodes.notes: Marks lead as contacted and updates timestamp

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO communication_logs (
  lead_id,
  type,
  direction,
  content,
  status,
  phone_number,
  metadata,
  created_at
) VALUES (
  '{{ $json.id }}'::uuid,
  'sms',
  'outbound',
  '{{ $json.sms_message }}',
  'sent',
  '{{ $json.formatted_phone }}',
  '{"template_type": "{{ $json.template_type }}", "excess_amount": {{ $json.excess_funds_amount || 0 }}, "is_super_golden": {{ $json.is_super_golden || false }}}'::jsonb,
  NOW()
);
